ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and will reward them for their steadfastness with a Garden and with silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And reward them for their perseverence Paradise and silken robes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and will reward them for their steadfastness with Paradise and robes of silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: For their patience, He will reward them with Paradise and silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And gave them Paradise and silk clothes, as a reward for their patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And their recompense shall be Paradise, and silken garments, because they were patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And reward them, because they were patient, with garden and silk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and recompensed them for their patience with a Garden, and silk;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And hath awarded them for all that they endured, a Garden and silk attire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and their reward for being patient will be a Garden and silk [clothing].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And shall recompense them for that which they patiently bare with a Garden and silken garment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He rewarded them for their patience with a garden and [garments of] silk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And their recompense shall be Paradise, and silken garments, because they were patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and recompense them for their patience with a Garden, and robes of silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And will reward them for their patience with a Garden and silk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:12] And He has rewarded them for their patience, for their steadfastness in refraining from disobedience, with a   Garden, into which they are admitted, and silk, which they are given to wear;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And hath awarded them for all that they endured) in the life of the world of poverty and misfortunes, (a 715 Garden and silk attire;
